title: Co-optex
text: The Tamil Nadu Handloom Weavers' Cooperative Society, popularly known as Co-optex, is a <a href="cooperative">cooperative</a> of traditional <a href="handloom">handloom</a> weavers of the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. This is under the control of Department of Handlooms, Handicrafts, Textiles and Khadi (Tamil Nadu) of <a href="Government%20of%20Tamil%20Nadu">Government of Tamil Nadu</a>. The organisation owns a number of shopping outlets in <a href="Tamil%20Nadu">Tamil Nadu</a>. Co-Optex also has an international arm, Co-optex International which exports its products to Germany, France, Netherlands, Belgium, Spain, Switzerland, Canada, Greece, Hong Kong, U.K. South Africa and the U.A.E.
